Package state

Interface IEventState

All Known Implementing Classes:
EventState
public interface IEventState
IEventState is an interface representing the portion of application state that contains all the Event information.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    EventPerformance createEventPerformance​(Event event, String venueAddress, LocalDateTime startDateTime, LocalDateTime endDateTime, List<String> performerNames, boolean hasSocialDistancing, boolean hasAirFiltration, boolean isOutdoors, int capacityLimit, int venueSize)
    Create a new EventPerformance (includes generating a new unique performance number) and add it to the list of an Event's performances
    NonTicketedEvent createNonTicketedEvent​(EntertainmentProvider organiser, String title, EventType type)
    Create a new NonTicketedEvent (includes generating a new unique event number) and add it to the event state
    TicketedEvent createTicketedEvent​(EntertainmentProvider organiser, String title, EventType type, double ticketPrice, int numTickets)
    Create a new TicketedEvent (includes generating a new unique event number) and add it to the event state
    Event findEventByNumber​(long eventNumber)  
    List<Event> getAllEvents()  

  • Method Details

    • getAllEvents

      List<Event> getAllEvents()
      Returns:
      List of all registered Events in the application

    • findEventByNumber

      Event findEventByNumber​(long eventNumber)
      Parameters:
      eventNumber - unique event identifier to look up in the event state
      Returns:
      Event corresponding to the specified event number if there is one, and null otherwise

    • createNonTicketedEvent

      NonTicketedEvent createNonTicketedEvent​(EntertainmentProvider organiser, String title, EventType type)
      Create a new NonTicketedEvent (includes generating a new unique event number) and add it to the event state
      Parameters:
      organiser - organiser of the new event
      title - name of the new event
      type - type of the new event
      Returns:
      The newly created NonTicketedEvent

    • createTicketedEvent

      TicketedEvent createTicketedEvent​(EntertainmentProvider organiser, String title, EventType type, double ticketPrice, int numTickets)
      Create a new TicketedEvent (includes generating a new unique event number) and add it to the event state
      Parameters:
      organiser - organiser of the new event
      title - name of the new event
      type - type of the new event
      ticketPrice - price per ticket of the new event in GBP
      numTickets - maximum number of tickets for the new event, which are all initially available
      Returns:
      The newly created TicketedEvent

    • createEventPerformance

      EventPerformance createEventPerformance​(Event event, String venueAddress, LocalDateTime startDateTime, LocalDateTime endDateTime, List<String> performerNames, boolean hasSocialDistancing, boolean hasAirFiltration, boolean isOutdoors, int capacityLimit, int venueSize)
      Create a new EventPerformance (includes generating a new unique performance number) and add it to the list of an Event's performances
      Parameters:
      event - event to add the new performance to
      venueAddress - address where the new performance will take place
      startDateTime - date and time when the new performance will begin
      endDateTime - date and time when the new performance will end
      performerNames - list of names of those who will be performing
      hasSocialDistancing - whether the new performance will have social distancing in place
      hasAirFiltration - whether the new performance will have air filtration in place
      isOutdoors - whether the new performance will be outdoors
      capacityLimit - the maximum number of attendees that will be allowed at this performance
      venueSize - the maximum number of visitors that can legally attend the venue (all other restrictions aside)
      Returns:
      The newly created EventPerformance
